# Setting Up Your Ubuntu Environment

This chapter covers the process of getting started with your Ubuntu environment.  Topics will include: 

* What is "SSH" and how do you use it to log into your instance as a root user?  
* How to work with public/private keys - and how to generate keypairs for use on a Chromebook
* Linux command line basics
* How to install software from the Linux command line - and understanding the meaning of "sudo"
* How to use the Ubuntu PPA and install core geospatial libraries
* How to manage users and grant sudo access
